snippet: The two sides will hold their highest-level talks since splitting amid a civil war 65 years ago, with hopes of increasing contacts and easing tensions.
abstract: Taiwan and China, meeting in Nanjing, will hold their highest-level talks since splitting amid a civil war 65 years ago; hope to increase contact and ease lingering tensions.
lead_paragraph: The two sides will hold their highest-level talks since splitting amid a civil war 65 years ago, with hopes of increasing contacts and easing tensions.

headline.main: Taiwan and China Ready to Begin Landmark Talks
headline.print_headline: Taiwan and China Ready to Begin Landmark Talks
